summary: The TypeScript SDK currently depends on protobufjs@6 while the latest proto3-json-serializer requires protobufjs@7, causing users to have both versions installed. This feature request proposes upgrading to protobufjs@7 to resolve the dependency conflict.
userImpact: Users experience duplicate protobufjs versions in their dependency tree, increasing bundle size and potential compatibility issues.
rootCause: SDK pins protobufjs@6 while proto3-json-serializer requires protobufjs@7, creating version mismatch.
proposedFix: Upgrade the SDK to use protobufjs@7 and migrate CLI usage to the new protobufjs-cli package.
resolutionDetails: The SDK was upgraded to protobufjs@7, resolving the dependency conflict and aligning with proto3-json-serializer requirements.
keyQuote: Latest proto3-json-serializer depends on protobufjs@7, and we curently depend on 6, which means users get both versions.
